name: Karate Hero
description:
Karate Hero – Become a real karate master!

You can now become a true, black-belt karate master! Be a shocking maiden or a fiery dude! Fight, train and go through the single-player adventure. With 7 exciting martial-arts challenges, you will never be bored and quickly on your way to become a true hero of karate!

Collect coins and fight your Facebook friends in challenging karate matches. Defeat your enemies, anticipate their moves and block their attacks for the maximum score. Rise to the top and be a black belt!

Start as a white-belt rookie, train, fight and reach your full potential! Break wooden planks to show your skill and harden your fists. Prove you're a winner; smash bricks, practice your kung-fu skills, fight dangerous beasts, ninja's and a fiery, fierce dragon. Defeat your enemies and become a real warrior! These masters of martial arts are among the most feared in history and it's up to you to beat them once and for all!

-Fun and challenging gameplay!
-Easy Facebook login. Don’t worry: we won’t post on your wall without your permission!
-Play trough seven unique single player levels!
-Train your character to be the best!
-Use the orbs to help you win!
-Oracle IAP’s let you see history of Each Move, Giving you an edge!
-Double Coins! Every coin earned in the game including Spar get's Doubled!
